snippet.title: Sokpop Heliopedia - 2 Planet Playthrough
snippet.description:
Become a monthly subscriber of Sokpop on Patreon and get access to their games. Downloadable through itch.io or through Steam.

Join now: https://www.patreon.com/sokpop/

Game: Heliopedia
Developer: Sokpop
Publisher: Sokpop

Sokpop is a collective of game developers who release new games frequently.

More details about Heliopedia here: https://sokpop.itch.io/heliopedia

A fictional universe sandbox/exploration game.

Collect materials, terraform planets and discover new species to add to your encyclopedia. Make beautiful microcosms of ocean planets, grass plains and rain forests, or breed destruction with wildfires, volcanoes, and lightning storms. What kind of worlds will you make?

Features

Pseudo-scientific chemistry system
10+ different biomes
Many diverse species of insects, plants, animals and trees
99 different items to find
2-3 hours of play time
